articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Honda Cars India sales dip 51% in August
articles.description: "The auto sector continues to witness high de-growth due to poor consumer sentiment," HCIL Senior Vice President and Director, Sales and Marketing Rajesh Goel said in a statement.
articles.content:
Honda Cars India Ltd (HCIL) on Sunday reported a 51.28 per cent decline in domestic sales at 8,291 units in August as against 17,020 units in the same month last year.
The company also exported 227 units last month.

articles.title: Pak violates ceasefire along LoC in J&K's Poonch
articles.description: "At about 1300 hours, Pakistan initiated ceasefire violation by firing of small arms and shelling with mortars in Poonch sector," Jammu-based Army PRO Lt Col Devender Anand said in a brief statement.
articles.content:
JAMMU: Pakistani troops on Sunday resorted to mortar shelling and small arms firing on forward posts and villages along the Line of Control (LoC) in Poonch district of Jammu and Kashmir, officials said.
